tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I wish I had seen Dr. Shivani earlier. A very attentive doctor and patient with all the queries. I have been to multiple hospitals abroad as well, I didn't find the support and care which Dr. Shivani has showed me in just one meeting. I'm very excited to have my delivery here as she's the only doctor that has given me hope for a vaginal delivery after caesarian.. Her advices are great and encouraging!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Since 6 months , am consulting Shivani madam...before this ,I have consulted many gynecologist....but Shivani madam is the best gynecologist I have ever seen..Lot of patience, friendly ,and she solve ur all queries with so much of patience and make sure that u are comfortable...Hoping to have a normal delivery with madam guidance.... Every one can consult without any hesitation. you  can b free and relaxed..
